body_html:
Re (1) I'd like to not add functionality to RefVariable since it'll go away in tf2.0.

Re (2) tf.Variable.from_proto will be retained and works with both resource and ref variables (there's a field in the proto which controls which one to create)
body_text:
Re (1) I'd like to not add functionality to RefVariable since it'll go away in tf2.0.
Re (2) tf.Variable.from_proto will be retained and works with both resource and ref variables (there's a field in the proto which controls which one to create)
body:
Re (1) I'd like to not add functionality to RefVariable since it'll go away in tf2.0.

Re (2) tf.Variable.from_proto will be retained and works with both resource and ref variables (there's a field in the proto which controls which one to create)
